description: The project is heavily dependent on a single Senior Backend Developer for critical, specialized skills in Jint sandboxing and at-rest encryption. Any availability issues with this resource would severely impact the critical path.
mitigation_strategy: Mandate pair programming between the senior and mid-level backend developers on all security-sensitive tasks. Prioritize extensive documentation for the JintEngineWrapper and encryption services.
contingency_plan: Have the Fullstack Developer shift to backend work to support if the primary senior developer is unavailable. Allocate budget for an on-demand security consultant.
monitoring_trigger: Senior backend developer's allocated tasks slip by more than 3 days in a sprint.

description: Complexity of Monaco Editor integration (REQ-UI-DTR-002) is underestimated, leading to significant delays in the frontend track, which is a critical path for user-facing features.
mitigation_strategy: Start Sprint 2 with a 2-day time-boxed technical spike to create a proof-of-concept for Monaco integration. If the spike fails, immediately evaluate simpler alternatives like CodeMirror.
contingency_plan: Revert to a simpler code editor component (e.g., CodeMirror) which has fewer features but lower integration risk. The Product Owner must approve this feature trade-off.
monitoring_trigger: The technical spike for Monaco integration fails to produce a working build within the allocated time.
